runs.task: Fix service worker stale file references
runs.details: Removed personalized-dashboard.js and event-filter.js from SW cache list (files don't exist). Bumped cache version to v10-cleanup.

runs.task: Implement updateFilterCount() stub
runs.details: Implemented the empty updateFilterCount() method to show a visible count of filtered events (e.g. '12 of 45 events'). Added #filterCount element and CSS to index.html. Count updates on filter toggle and initial load.

runs.task: Add dashboard filter and utility unit tests
runs.details: Extracted pure functions into docs/js/dashboard-helpers.js and added 52 unit tests covering escapeHtml, formatEventTime, getRelativeTime, sportDisplayName, getAbbreviatedTeamName, truncateTitle, passesFilter, and isFavoriteEvent.

runs.task: Remove dead open-data fallback fetches
runs.details: Removed 4 dead fallback fetch attempts for non-existent -open.json files (football-open.json, f1-open.json, chess-open.json, esports-open.json) from docs/js/sports-api.js. These caused unnecessary 404 network errors on every page load.

runs.task: Add ARIA accessibility attributes to dashboard
runs.details: Added role=navigation to filter section, aria-pressed to all filter buttons with dynamic JS toggling, aria-label to icon-only buttons, role=list/listitem to events container/cards, and aria-live=polite to dynamically updated regions.

runs.task: Add lazy loading to event card images
runs.details: Added loading=lazy attribute to team logo images (home/away) and golfer headshot images in simple-dashboard.js for improved page load performance.

runs.task: Remove production console.log statements
runs.details: Removed 32 debug-level console.log calls from docs/sw.js (9), docs/js/sports-api.js (18), docs/js/simple-dashboard.js (2), and docs/index.html (3). Retained console.error calls. Upgraded SW registration failure to console.error.

runs.task: Add CSS styling for event-time-exact class
runs.details: Added missing CSS definition for .event-time-exact class in docs/index.html. Styled with smaller font (0.75rem), muted color, reduced opacity, and tabular-nums for aligned digits.

runs.task: Add keyboard focus styles for filter buttons
runs.details: Added :focus-visible outline styles to .filter-btn and .sport-filter elements in docs/index.html. Keyboard users can now see focused buttons during tab navigation.

runs.task: Clarify scripts/fetch/fotball-no.js integration status
runs.details: Investigated and found fotball-no.js is already properly integrated: imported by both football.js and football-refactored.js to fetch OBOS-ligaen Lyn matches via fotball.no API. No changes needed.

runs.task: Add ai-assistant.js to service worker cache list
runs.details: File was already present in SW install cache at docs/sw.js line 25. No changes needed.

runs.task: Remove dead code from sports-api.js
runs.details: Removed unreachable TheSportsDB fallback block in fetchFootballEvents(), four unused format methods (formatFootballEvents, formatGolfEvents, formatTennisEvents, formatF1Events), and unused apiKeys property. 93 lines deleted.

runs.task: Fix memory leak: store setInterval ID
runs.details: Stored setInterval return value in this.refreshInterval in simple-dashboard.js for proper lifecycle management.

runs.task: Add rel=noopener noreferrer to streaming links
runs.details: Added missing rel='noopener noreferrer' to streaming badge links in simple-dashboard.js line 1320. Other external links already had this attribute.

runs.task: Add prefers-reduced-motion support
runs.details: Added @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) block to docs/index.html to disable all CSS transitions and animations for users with vestibular disorders.

runs.task: Remove unused .view-toggle and .view-btn CSS rules
runs.details: Removed .view-toggle and .view-btn CSS rules (main + mobile overrides) with no corresponding HTML elements. ~39 lines of dead CSS removed. Kept @keyframes spin which is actively used.

runs.task: Add dashboard-helpers.js to service worker cache
runs.details: Added docs/js/dashboard-helpers.js to SW install cache list in docs/sw.js. Bumped cache version to v11-helpers for cache refresh.

runs.task: Add unit tests for preferences-manager.js
runs.details: Added 29 unit tests in tests/preferences-manager.test.js covering load/save, sport/team/player CRUD, fuzzy matching, multi-criteria event favorite detection, view/theme, exportForBackend, and reset.

runs.task: Add unit tests for sports-api.js formatters
runs.details: Added 17 unit tests in tests/sports-api.test.js covering formatTournamentData (structure, defaults, golf fields), formatDateTime (TBD, Today, Tomorrow, N-days), and groupEventsByDay (7-day init, bucketing, TBD/out-of-range filtering).

runs.task: Add meta description and theme-color tags
runs.details: Added <meta name=description> for SEO and <meta name=theme-color content=#667eea> for OS-level theming in mobile browsers. 2 lines added to docs/index.html.

runs.task: Extract duplicate sport emoji mappings into shared config
runs.details: Created docs/js/sport-config.js with shared SPORT_CONFIG constant. Replaced duplicate emoji/name mappings in simple-dashboard.js (3 locations), settings-ui.js, and dashboard-helpers.js. Added to SW cache (v12).

runs.task: Add input validation to preferences-manager
runs.details: Added null/empty/whitespace guards to addFavoriteTeam() and addFavoritePlayer(). Methods now return true/false. Added 6 validation tests.
